Summary: it looked like a shooting star but it started at the top of the moutain and went allmost straight up and was gone in sec
trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Klamath Falls
There were no other sightings in Klamath Falls on or around August 8th 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsI was pulling in the driveway at home when I got out of the car and looked at the mountian range. I saw a light just sitting there. Then, looking like a shooting star, it shot almost straight up but north, and was gone from visual eyesight in seconds! I have seen this exact thing in the same spot now on two different occassions. Our airplane traffic is a good 10-15 miles away from where I saw these.
